item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, September 18, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple Mobile Processors Are Now Made in America by TSMC (572 points | 199 comments)
2. Scramble: Open-Source Alternative to Grammarly (131 points | 47 comments)
3. Entire Independent Board of Directors of 23andMe Resigns (368 points | 173 comments)
4. macOS Sequoia 15 may bypass DNS encryption (409 points | 134 comments)
5. Atkinson Hyperlegible Font (430 points | 116 comments)
6. GraalPy – A high-performance embeddable Python 3 runtime for Java (229 points | 108 comments)
7. Asgard launches world's first DDR5-9600 DIMMs (16 points | 10 comments)
8. John Peralta Explodes Historic Technology into Three-Dimensional Diagrams (43 points | discuss)
9. Rga: Ripgrep, but also search in PDFs, E-Books, Office documents, zip, etc. (379 points | 38 comments)
10. The Lego Great Ball Contraption (197 points | 33 comments)
11. Reports of the Death of Dental Cavities Are Greatly Exaggerated (83 points | 44 comments)
12. Show HN: sol – A de-minifier for shell programs (7 points | discuss)
13. Show HN: Open Scanner, an open-source document scanning app for iPhone (197 points | 64 comments)
14. Please stop – putting cookie pop-ups on your website (2022) (67 points | 70 comments)
15. A Friendly Introduction to Assembly for High-Level Programmers (113 points | 9 comments)
16. Implement algorithms that minimize slippage (22 points | discuss)
17. Emerge Tools (YC W21) is hiring a senior front end engineer ( | hide)
18. Scrolling Text Display (34 points | 1 comment)
19. OpenTelemetry Tracing in < 200 lines of code (158 points | 19 comments)
20. Hezbollah pager explosions kill several people in Lebanon (778 points | 1712 comments)
21. Why Gauss wanted a heptadecagon on his tombstone (242 points | 52 comments)
22. STORM: Get a Wikipedia-like report on your topic (96 points | 42 comments)
23. 26-Year-Old EY Employee Succumbs to 'Work Stress' Four Months After Joining (42 points | 7 comments)
24. Rustpad is an efficient and minimal open-source collaborative text editor (36 points | 2 comments)
25. Launch HN: Marblism (YC W24) – Generate full-stack web apps from a prompt (108 points | 72 comments)
26. WonderWorld: Interactive 3D Scene Generation from a Single Image (140 points | 13 comments)
27. The Double Irish Dutch Sandwich: End of a Tax Evasion Strategy (180 points | 148 comments)
28. Exploring pre-1990 versions of wc(1) (2023) (32 points | 5 comments)
29. The centrality of stupidity in mathematics (234 points | 139 comments)
30. The port of the Windows 95 Start Menu was not all it seemed (25 points | 11 comments)
